field.name: Creator
field.xpath: string-join(distinct-values(//cmd:CMD/cmd:Components/cmd:Session/cmd:MDGroup/cmd:Actors/cmd:Actor[cmd:Role = 'Author' or cmd:Role = 'Collector' or cmd:Role = 'Researcher' or cmd:Role = 'Annotator' or cmd:Role = 'Filmer' or cmd:Role = 'Recorder']/cmd:FullName/text()), ';')

string-join(distinct-values(//cmd:CMD/cmd:Components/cmd:Session/cmd:MDGroup/cmd:Actors/cmd:Actor[cmd:Role = 'Author' or cmd:Role = 'Collector' or cmd:Role = 'Researcher' or cmd:Role = 'Annotator' or cmd:Role = 'Filmer' or cmd:Role = 'Recorder']/cmd:Name/text()), ';')
